title: Thomson B9 Series 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart TV  (32M3277)

product_specification.In The Box: TV Unit, Remote Controller (Technology / Quantity): IR / 1, Battery (Size / Quantity): AAA / 2, User Manual, Wall Mount
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: AVI, MPG, DAT, VOB, DIV, MOV, MKV, RM
product_specification.Other Video Features: Built-in Digital Media, Digital Audio Output to Connect External Audio Systems, Digital Noise Reduction, Response Time: 6.5 ms
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Total Surround, Automatic Volume Level (AVL), Audio Equalizer, Audio, Digital Media Player (DMP) Content - Music, Music Alone Mode, Noice Reduction 3D, Sport Mode
product_specification.Content Languages: Marathi, Gujarati, Sinhala, Kannada, Tamil, Rajasthani, Hindi, English, Punjabi, Telugu, Bengali, Urdu, Malayalam, Bhojpuri, Oriya
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Download any Smart TV App, App Store, Browser, Micracast, Quick Interface, Live Internet TV, Pre-download App YouTube, Netflix
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network RJ45 Eathernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), RJ45- 10/100M, DHCP, Browser HTML5 Support, HDMI Support HDMI-CEC, HDMI-ARC, HDMI-MHL, USB 2 x USB2.0
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: OSD Display Time Adjustable, Image Freeze, Eco Mode - Off-High-Mid-Low, Q View, Auto Channel Search, Channel Manager, Multimedia Support Picture Music-video-text
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect arising out of Faulty or defective material or workmanship,Parts & Labour cost is covered
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The product is not used according to instructions given in the instruction manual. Defects caused by improper use as determined by the company personnel. Modification or alteration of any nature is made in the electrical circuitry/or physical construction of the set. Installation/ repair work is carried out by persons/agency other than authorized by the company. Site (premises where the product is kept) conditions that do not confirm to the recommended operating conditions of the machine. Original serial number is removed, obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet. Defects due to cause beyond control like lightning, abnormal voltage, acts of god or while in transit to service centre or purchaser's residence. The warranty does not cover any external accessories (such as battery, cable, carrying bag etc.) Mentioned in the operating instruction manual supplied with this product or any cosmetic parts.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.A Premium Cinematic Experience: Characterised by its innovative design and user-friendly functionality, this HD Ready smart TV opens you up to a plethora of entertainment choices. You even have the option of connecting other devices to it.

review:
Good product to compete in the market
1 screen clarity 5/5
2 sound 5/5
3 smart TV 5/5 better than mi TV
4 plays all media devices it's got CEC on HDMI but no Dolby support

wish it had Bluetooth too as finding it difficult to play games
overall a good product from a reliable company

quick delivery n installation...nice product good picture quality as compared to mi 32inch ...sound quality is good ...but screen mirroring is not that good videos are interrupted...also in description they said 8gb of internal but in actual we get only 6gb of ram that too 500mb is used for system..

1. Delivery & Installation.
a. Delivered within 24 hrs, Packaged & Protected well.
b. The Tv built quality is strong & weighs feather light.
c. The Installation is very easy & simple, you don't require to wait for an engineer for 48 hrs to come, install & setup the TV. (In case, the TV has to be placed on Leg stand, not Wall mount.)

2. Features:
a. Picture quality is good with regular Set top box, Actual quality will be better if connected to a HD Set top Box.
b. Easy to setup Wifi connection and connects smoothly every time in TV startup mode. Plays and reads HD / DVD / Blue Ray Movies smoothly from USB depending on the format.
c.The Smart TV Interface is easy to scroll and type using the Remote. The mouse option lets you click particular options on the TV screen.
d. The Sound quality is clear and crisp.
e. Google Playstore app lets you scroll through various Apps for Installation. The Tv comes with 8 GB storage space wherein 5 GB is available for usage purpose only.


3. Cons:
a. The remote doesn't come with a Home button which normally takes to directly to Smart TV option. In this case, you need to press the EXIT button on the remote for Smart Tv Option.
b. The Tv comes with a wrong TV Model User Manual.
c. The Tv has a Miracast feature which limits itself to screen cast and not Screen Mirroring. Due to which your screen will lags when you connect it to your Andoird Mobile / Tablet over Lan internet or Wifi. Incompatible to connect Iphone/Ipad apps with Screen Mirroring feature since its screen cast only.

The sound was not good bcoz of set top box.. Once replaced it box i realised the sound was perfect and even better than many other high range televisions.. Coming to display it is really very good but standard resolution tend to pixelate naturally.. Some video n sound enhancements need to be done by users only. Had an amazing experience watching movies and youtube videos even without home theatre system.. This 40 inch TV covers almost 1/3 of the wall so it gives a cinematic experience. Hope u now like the product.. Some of the enhancements to be done manually are described below:
1) bass n treble at 70
2) picture should hv 30 backlight
3) sharpness, contrast n brightness should be around 40 n color temperature is standard.
4) Let the Eco Mode remain at middle..
5) enable surround sound for clear separated flow of vocals n instruments..

Now the device is ready for giving a enjoyable, strainless experience.. Hope u now would like the product n like the review instead of just disliking it..

Wireless keyboard abd mouse supported perfectly .

Installation was quick within one day of purchase it's done, for that it's 5star.
Coming to Screen and Sound wasn't that great, will see pixelate from near.. better to have atleast 7 ft distance to get good view. we need to adjust the picture mode settings to get good clarity of picture, default picture modes have more sharpness, if adjusted to 30 to 35 it's good. HD channels are good HDMI ports given bottom which is not convenient to place &remove if been wall mounted, need to pull tv while putting cable.
Smart TV perspective it's good, able to browse, watch youtube videos @1080p. Hotstar video not working. Wifi connection is fine.

Coming to remote, give basic remote with buttons. if you want type anything while searching, it's difficult and time consuming.

Images and videos are playing from harddisk, Sound is loud but not much clarity. Overall it's good for the given price.

I bought this television on 18-04-18 , delivered on 19th evening (mumbai) and installed on 20th night 10 p.m. The engineer visited my home and wall mounted it free of cost. I tried to buy MI tv 43" but I could not. For those who are sceptical about which one to buy, I will advice you to go with thomson as it is a well established brand. I am not promoting nor discouraging MI but want to say THOMSON is no less than MI. If you are unable to buy MI then try this in the flash sale. These are the things which I feel good in this TV

* Picture quality is good
* It is light weight and perfectly designed
* Netflix and youtube are preloaded and absolutely fine
* Miracast working good on my LENOVO K5 PLUS mobile

These are the areas which I feel need to improve
* There are many users who use smart tv without dish connection and this message NO SIGNAL is being displayed. Every time we switch on we get this message.
* Sound is good but lacks some clearness.
* Typing is a huge task . I think all tvs have this problem. You will get tired after typing some 10 characters in that virtual keypad.
* No playstore. Hotstar is not working.
* Whenever we get some ugly scenes in a movie we can forward it easily in a laptop or mobile . But here while trying to forward it in youtube , I bet the scene will be completed. User interface can be improved

MI TV and this one size is almost same and price also . The extra 3000 is for extra 3 inches but for a middle class room this tv is more than enough. You need more space to view 40 inhes tv otherwise your eyes will get strained easily.
On a whole go for it. We do not have a 40 inch tv other than this in our market. The engineer , who came to my house also personally feels that thomson is a bit better than MI . Just take my review as a reference and go for mi/thomson which suits your needs..Just keep in mind that every tv has its own flaws. Just buy the one which has less and suits you more... Thank you.

I would say it's a beast in this price range. I am surprised why after 15 days since it's inception there is not so much channels in you tube. But one will find innumerable channels of MI Tv. So My earnest request do not follow these people blindly. They work like agents of some company. Now let's hv in depth review of Thompson TV. This is same company which was there in India in 80's at Par with the Onida, BPL, Akai, Funai. So it i has some brand under its belt. Mi is of recent origin so far as television is concerned. They are applying some tactics here in view of there popularity in mobile & launch smart tv. Thompson TV picture clarity is better than MI Tv as its color reproduction is good. 20 watt sound is more than enough for the price one paid. For good woofer experience I would suggest F&D home theater 5.2.Mirror cast work flawlessly in honor, MI, Le TV phones. I hv used it personally. So much Internet options and easy to use. Remote looks OK. People complain about its cheap quality. I would say even my favorite shinobi pro of Panasonic smart tv has plastic remote control. But can Sony Samsung and LG compete with its sound and picture clarity. You tube, Netflix are in inbuilt in Thompson TV. But in MI Tv u will only get buffering. For this price I would say hats off to Thompson and Flipkart for quick installation and also last but not the least Jeeves.

I ordered this TV through Flipkart. After 2-3 days, I noticed some weird purple color appearing on the screen. I called Flipkart and they replaced the TV. I faced the problem in new replaced TV as well. It was getting switched off again and again. Once again I called Flipkart for return and this time I requested my money back. They accepted the request and refunded the money. Flipkart executive were fully supportive and Thanks to them for their prompt response.

I would also like to add one more thing. When I bought this TV, Thomson executive called me to give 5 star rating to this product. And in return, they offered me to extend the TV warranty by 3 months. I refused their offer as I don't want to misguide the actual buyers by my fake review and rating to this product.

Cons:

1. Picture quality is not good.
2. Sound quality is not good.
3. Not able to connect to my MOTO G4 mobile. Jeevs Executive told us that only MI mobile will work with this TV.

Pos:

1. money wise cheaper.

this smart TV has good picture quality..it support Android 5.1 lollipop..pre-loaded apps are youtube,netflix,gmail,miracast, aptoide TV are working fine....new app can be installed like hotstar,jiotv,airtel tv from Google Play Store very easily .. there are some issues like...miracast sometimes lags while playing video from Android phone ..gmail works only after updating google play services app...airtel TV is working but lags when watching live tv......jiotv can be installed from Android phone by transferring apk file via xender app..jiotv is working but there is poor video quality while watching live tv...hotstar can be installed from Google Play Store and it is working fine sometimes....one drawback of this TV is that there is no mobile remote control app..tv can be operated via only tv remote.....for scrolling any app u have to use separate wireless mouse ..however there is mouse cursor option in the tv remote ...there is no home button on TV remote app....there is need to install Google Play movies app to watch live jio tv ,airtel tv...miracast has issue about casting related to hotstar from Android phone to tv , on tv only black screen is showing n audio is playing without video.. overall TV is good ...nice picture video quality n sound....TV look is very nice ...

I was trying to order a TV with more features at a cheap and best price for so long... this TV fulfilled all my demands at the cheapest price... totally satisfied with it... really loving it... working on WiFi seamlessly... playing YouTube videos smoothly... got delivered it next day...very happy with the TV.... best part having Bluetooth also which is lacking in mi TV... wallmount, remote battery were also free with it...fully satisfied...

I bought Thomson TV on June, 2018. It stopped working on October, 2018. Called customer care on Oct 22 and raised a complaint. A service engineer came and inspected the tv and said it will take 15 days to replace a board. The board has to come from bangalore to chennai. Does it take 15 days for sending a board from bangalore to chennai? Thomson's service network/infrastructure is not up to the mark. Go for a well known brand with better service network, even if it costs more.

My honest review after using this Smart TV for 1 month!
Pros:
1. Great Picture quality & viewing angles with different picture modes
2. Sound is loud enough
3. No lags while surfing the internet, file manager or watching videos on YouTube.
4. Value for money go for it!

Cons:
1. You might face connectivity issues 10 out of 2 times while using screen cast or mirror display.
2. If your video resolution is 1920 x 1080 i.e. 1080p of height, then it will not work. Less than 1080p of height is ok.
*Fix: Install any third party app like MX player or VLC player*
3. Mouse mode or typing while keyboard pop-up is not handy, you need to be familiar with it or connect external mouse or keyboard!

*Tip: Though it has 8 GB of internal memory, only 5 GB is free of it so do not install too many third party apps, or you might find some lags in performance.*

💠PRICE
◆As a Smart Tv good in bellow 15k

💠SCREEN
◆It's Not UHD. (Ultra HD)
◆Brightness Low
[Can't expect more in that price]

💠BUILD
◆Not Sturdy. Looks Price cutting happens there.
◆Power Cord feels Cheap.

💠FEATURES
◆1GB RAM
◆8GB Memory (5GB Available for use)
◆Sound Good..I liked.. Enough for 300-400sq.ft Hall
◆Ordinary Remote. Cursor Key and Browser Buttons on Remote relieves some pain. (Air Mouse expected)
◆Smart Mode isn't easier to access. after lots of trials found ⬆️Button on bottom of remote.
◆Can use Few Apps Due to memory. Anyways Playstore, Apptoide is there to get apps. Also we can side load specific apps.
◆Voltage Garud is not inbuilt. Have to Get Separately.
◆Miracast worked for me. (Redemi Notes .Wireless Display feature Helps in that case) Makes TV real smart.
◆Inbuilt wifi is one of the plus point.
◆Starting time reminds me of Celeron PC's, It takes 20-30 Seconds
◆Table Mount Stand is Good. But wall mount is very basic..Hanging type. (Capable to Hold this lightweight TV)
◆Headphone Sound Medium.
◆No Gamepad Support. (Tried BL Dongle, Wifi Gamepads...Hands Down)😢👿

💠BUYING EXP.
◆Best As Always. Fast Delivery, Quick Installation...Flipkart Master in it.

💠OVER ALL
Go for it..If you like to use smart tv as Good Basic TV

3 Stars only because the delivery, coordination with customer service, installation, uninstallation, return & refund was very smooth and professional. Appreciation to Flipkart, Jeeves and ekart for their service. Now about the Thomson TV : TV is made of poor quality. The first TV that was installed, the TV display color would turn purplish 3 of 5 times we turn it on. The quick fix was to turn it off and turn it on. Colour Red was very bright and watching some channel/movies that had a lot of use of red made watching uncomfortable after 15-20 mins of continuous watching. I found articles on the net which described this issue generally to the panel. So i requested for exchange. Pick-up, Delivery was all seamless and promptly carried out but the second time the TV came, it had the very same problem. So it returned it and asked for refund. The TV is manufactured by 'Super Plastronics' a delhi based company which also makes other brands like Kodak. They have license to use the 'Thomson' brand name but it appears there's zero quality check by Thomson. About the product quality : there's a big gap between the bezel and panel, so big that 10 sheets of paper thickness can easily slip in, which indicates that the panel and bezel (bezel holds the brand name) are manufactured independently and not aligned correctly. 40“ looks like a 34 inch TV in reality and if you are using AV port from cable setup box, there's lot of blurryness and lag when scene change quickly, which means its slow to refresh colours. Hotstar never worked, even after app was upgraded. It uses an old version of android, so Amazon prime also does not work. Wall mounting accessory looks like a normal photo hanging metal piece and it uses hard sponge at the rear base to keep the TV from directly touching the wall. On the positive side, it has 2 AV ports, reads USB storage upto 2 Tb.
Value for money. Nice product, picture quality is great and WiFi is fast working, it's only for YouTube and search. Installation is toooo late and not satisfy.
